pkgmetadata.longdescription: Coincident Profile // Builds the coincident profile proposed by Martinez, W and Nieto, Fabio H and Poncela, P (2016) doi:10.1016/j.spl.2015.11.008. This methodology studies the relationship between a couple of time series based on the the set of turning points of each time series. The coincident profile establishes if two time series are coincident, or one of them leads the second.
